DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify incidence rate urinary tract infection routine outpatient cystoscopy non-sterile ( clean ) sterile procedural technique .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Sterilization Technique Incidence Urinary Tract Infection After Cystoscopy
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Patients undergo routine outpatient flexible cystoscopy Patients urinary tract infection within 3 month prior flexible cystoscopy Patients indwell catheter
